turns.speaker: user

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, the truffle mac and cheese sounds divine! But here's a tricky question: I have a severe gluten intolerance. Does 'The Cheesy Corner' offer any gluten-free options, and if so, how can I be sure it's prepared safely to avoid cross-contamination?

turns.speaker: agent
